plot: A young woman is forced into a convent. However, due to her nobility she rises to be an abbess. She has to deal with corruption in the church.
title: La madre superiora del pecado
plot_es: A young woman is forced into a convent. However, due to her nobility she rises to be an abbess. She has to deal with corruption in the church.
plot_en: A young woman is forced into a convent. However, due to her nobility she rises to be an abbess. She has to deal with corruption in the church.

cast.role: Elena di Campireali, abbess of Castro
cast.name: Barbara Bouchet
